Microfilm received 15 April 2004.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Middlesex County was formed in 1669 from Lancaster County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Records, 1686-1875, of Middlesex County Circuit Court consist of a copy of an inventory and appraisement of Roger Jones' estate (1741), copy of the appraisement of Ralph and John Wormley's estate (1830), copy of Eleanor Wormley's will (1815), and extracts from deed books, will books, marriage records, inventories, and appraisements (1686-1825) that were copied by an unidentified individual in 1875.

originalsloc.head: Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: Originals are located at the Henry E. Huntington Library, San Marino, California.
